content:
XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase> Class

In this Article

Provides a common API surface for techniques that generate initialization or serialization values for XAML based on input other than the eventual destination type. This includes markup extensions and type converters.

Syntax

Declaration

public class XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase> : IEquatable<System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase>> where TConverterBase : class

Type Parameters

TConverterBase

The CLR base class for the particular converter that this XamlValueConverter(TConverterBase) represents. Typically this is one of the following: TypeConverter; MarkupExtension; ValueSerializer;

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase>

Inherited Members

Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)

Remarks

Instances of this type are returned by methods of the XAML schema API such as LookupTypeConverter. The generic implementation of XamlValueConverter(TConverterBase) provides indirection for the System.Xaml assembly so that the basic XAML schema and type system does not have to take dependencies on different value conversion techniques that are typically implementations in other assemblies.

A XamlValueConverter(TConverterBase) can be constructed with a null implementation type, but such a XamlValueConverter(TConverterBase) will return null for CreateInstance.

Constructor signatures for XamlValueConverter(TConverterBase) use a converterType parameter that references the specific type that implements the conversion behavior. For a properly functioning XamlValueConverter(TConverterBase) (one that has a nonnull ConverterInstance), the converterType type is expected to be castable to the TConverterBase constraint. A mismatch condition is not enforced by constructors, but might produce an InvalidCastException at run time.

Constructors summary

XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase>(Type,XamlType)

Initializes a new instance of the stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1 class, based on a converter implementing Type and the target/destination type of the stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1.
XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase>(Type,XamlType,String)

Initializes a new instance of the stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1 class, based on a converter implementing Type the target/destination type of the stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1, and a string name.

Properties summary

ConverterInstance

Gets a created instance of the converter implementation.
ConverterType

Gets the Type for the class that implements the converter behavior.
Name

Gets a string name for this stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1.
TargetType

Gets the target/destination XamlType of the stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1.

Methods summary

CreateInstance()

Returns an instance of the converter implementation.
Equals(Object)

Determines whether this instance of stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1 and a specified object, which must also be a stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1 object, have the same value.
Equals(XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase>)

Determines whether this instance of stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1 and another stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1 object have the same value.
GetHashCode()

Returns the hash code for this stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1.
ToString()

Returns a String that represents this stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1.

Operators summary

op_Equality(XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase>,XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase>)

Determines whether two specified stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1 objects have the same value.
op_Inequality(XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase>,XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase>)

Determines whether two specified stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1 objects have different values.

Constructors

  • XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase>(Type,XamlType)

    Initializes a new instance of the stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1 class, based on a converter implementing Type and the target/destination type of the stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1.

    public XamlValueConverter (Type converterType, System.Xaml.XamlType targetType);

    Parameters

    • converterType
      Type

      The Type that implements the converter behavior.

    • targetType
      XamlType

      The target/destination XamlType of the stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1.

  • XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase>(Type,XamlType,String)

    Initializes a new instance of the stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1 class, based on a converter implementing Type the target/destination type of the stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1, and a string name.

    public XamlValueConverter (Type converterType, System.Xaml.XamlType targetType, string name);

    Parameters

    • converterType
      Type

      The Type that implements the converter behavior.

    • targetType
      XamlType

      The target/destination XamlType of the stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1.

    • name
      String

      The string name.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentException

      All three parameters are null (at least one is required to be non-null).

    Remarks

    If name is provided as null, a default name is generated based on either converterType or targetType.

Properties

  • ConverterInstance

    Gets a created instance of the converter implementation.

    public TConverterBase ConverterInstance { get; }

    Property Value

    • TConverterBase

      A created instance of the converter implementation, or null.

    Remarks

    ConverterInstance calls the protected default implementation of CreateInstance to get its value (and might be accessing a stored value if ConverterInstance was already called once on this XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase>.

    A XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase> can be constructed with a null implementation type, but such a XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase> will return null for ConverterInstance.

  • ConverterType

    Gets the Type for the class that implements the converter behavior.

    public Type ConverterType { get; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      The Type for the class that implements the converter behavior.

  • Name

    Gets a string name for this stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1.

    public string Name { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string name for this stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1.

    Remarks

    The value of this property is established by one of the following:

    • A constructor parameter (see XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase>).

    • Internal logic that processes other constructor inputs and forms a string.

  • TargetType

    Gets the target/destination XamlType of the stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1.

    public System.Xaml.XamlType TargetType { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      The target/destination XamlType of the stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1.

Methods

  • CreateInstance()

    Returns an instance of the converter implementation.

    protected virtual TConverterBase CreateInstance ();

    Returns

    • TConverterBase

      An instance of the converter implementation, or null.

    Exceptions

    • XamlSchemaException

      Converter did not implement the correct base type.

    Remarks

    CreateInstance is protected. To get a converter instance with a public API, get the value of ConverterInstance.

    A XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase> can be constructed with a null implementation type, but such a XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase> will return null for CreateInstance.

  • Equals(Object)

    Determines whether this instance of stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1 and a specified object, which must also be a stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1 object, have the same value.

    public override bool Equals (object obj);

    Parameters

    • obj
      System.Object

      The object to compare.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if obj is a stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1 and its value is the same as this instance; otherwise, false.

  • Equals(XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase>)

    Determines whether this instance of stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1 and another stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1 object have the same value.

    public bool Equals (System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase> other);

    Parameters

    • other
      XamlValueConverter

      The stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1 to compare.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if other is a stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1 and its value is the same as this instance; otherwise, false.

  • GetHashCode()

    Returns the hash code for this stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1.

    public override int GetHashCode ();

    Returns

    • Int32

      An integer hash code.

  • ToString()

    Returns a String that represents this stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1.

    public override string ToString ();

    Returns

    • String

      A String that represents this stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1.

    Remarks

    The ToString value is based on Name.

Operators

  • op_Equality(XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase>,XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase>)

    Determines whether two specified stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1 objects have the same value.

    public static bool op_Equality (System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase> converter1, System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase> converter2);

    Parameters

    • converter1
      XamlValueConverter

      A stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1, or null.

    • converter2
      XamlValueConverter

      A stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1, or null.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the value of converter1 is the same as the value of converter2; otherwise, false.

  • op_Inequality(XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase>,XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase>)

    Determines whether two specified stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1 objects have different values.

    public static bool op_Inequality (System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase> converter1, System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter<TConverterBase> converter2);

    Parameters

    • converter1
      XamlValueConverter

      A stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1, or null.

    • converter2
      XamlValueConverter

      A stem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1, or null.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the value of converter1 is different than the value of converter2; otherwise, false.
